title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get $$\frac{\left(x+2\right) \left(x^2-25\right)}{\left(x^2-3x-10\right) x}$$
speech: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get  fraction, parentheses x plus 2,  times, parentheses, x squared minus 25, , over, parentheses, x squared minus 3 x minus 10  times x,
pacedSpeech: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get   fraction,  x plus 2,  times, , x squared minus 25, , over, , x squared minus 3 x minus 10  times x,

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: This fraction can be simplified through factoring. $$\frac{\left(x+2\right) \left(x^2-25\right)}{\left(x^2-3x-10\right) x}=\frac{\left(x+2\right) \left(x-5\right) \left(x+5\right)}{\left(x-5\right) \left(x+2\right) x}=\frac{x+5}{x}$$
speech: This fraction can be simplified through factoring.  fraction, parentheses x plus 2,  times, parentheses, x squared minus 25, , over, parentheses, x squared minus 3 x minus 10  times x,  is equal to fraction, parentheses x plus 2,  times, parentheses x minus 5,  times, parentheses x plus 5, , over, parentheses x minus 5,  times, parentheses x plus 2,  times x,  is equal to, fraction, x plus 5, over x,
